name: Angry dad beatdown
description:
!WARNING! TURN DOWN AUDIO VOLUME  !WARNING !

Ever since high-school, Michael wanted revenge for all the bullying  Biff did to him.

Now is his chance ! 

Help Michael to defeat Biff in a bloody bare-knuckle boxing match out in the streets.

Below 50% health, biff will enrage, doing more damage, growing in size and regaining stamina quicker.
